titleStmt.title: A bosome-piece for communicants. Or, The nature and design of the sacrament of the Lord's-Supper Laid open in a letter to Mrs, [sic] Eliz. Yearley, of Ockham in Surrey. By Joshua Stanley, late chaplain to the Lady Nicholas.
titleStmt.author: Stanley, Joshua, b. 1645 or 6.

publicationStmt.publisher: [printed and sold by Benj. Harris, at the corner of Grace church-street next Corn-hill],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
